name: Feather (itch) (Aevi)
description:
You find yourself stuck in a mysterious underground cavern, full of strange artifacts. With your flying abilities lost, you must find and collect feathers in the cavern. Hopefully they will lend your wings enough strength to fly away from this world that you do not belong.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feather is a game created by Anna Margrét Jónudóttir and Martina Marchio,

at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
